name: Ruby
info:
An introverted and innocent girl who doesn't know much about the world. She is kinda afraid of strangers and prefers staying alone. Maybe that is why she is somewhat scared and shy in front of strangers. 
Always called "the kid with Madam Lin," she developed a sense of purposeâ€”she must work harder and become stronger so that she wouldn't be a burden to Lin or let Lin's instructions go in vain.
description:
The daughter of an old friend to Lin. And somehow, she's now taken care of by Lin, and they even take action together. The girl doesn't seem strong, like a sick, weak child. 
She is currently under combat skill training for self-protection upon Lin's request. Though Ruby is learning something quite different from Lin's style, she is, at least, much healthier than before and capable enough for quite some tricky situations. 
She still has nothing but a vague idea about the world and herself, believing in Lin's instructions and description blindly, and relying on her for almost every decision. In the current situation, Lin comments that cultivating her independence is definitely the priority here.

skills.name: Spark Attack
skills.description: On the ground, tap the normal attack button to command Spark to attack 5 times in a row. The first attack deals total damage equal to 84.6% of ATK + 4 against each target. The second attack deals total damage equal to 93% of ATK + 5 against each target. The third attack deals total damage equal to 101.5% of ATK + 5 against each target. The fourth attack deals total damage equal to 109.9% of ATK + 6 against each target. The fifth attack deals total damage equal to 253.7% of ATK + 13 against each target and launches targets.

skills.name: Aerial Discharge
skills.description: While airborne, tap normal attack to command Spark to attack 4 times in a row. First Attack: Deal total damage equal to 97.1% of ATK + 5 against each target. Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to 106.8% of ATK + 6 against each target. Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to 121.3% of ATK + 6 against each target. Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to 145.6% of ATK + 8 against each target.

skills.name: Gotcha!
skills.description: Tap and hold the normal attack button or do this after Lockdown Zone is triggered to continuously fire searing energy beams at enemies in a target direction, dealing damage equal to 40% of ATK + 2 and consuming their endurance.

skills.name: Blazing Dive
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Blazing Dive. Envelop the body in energy before rapidly deep plunging into the ground, dealing damage equal to 172.1% of ATK + 9 to nearby targets.

skills.name: Lockdown Zone
skills.description: After the second normal attack, hold the button during any attack to deal damage equal to 40% of ATK + 2 against the target, imprison (not strong control) and burn the locked-on target for 3 seconds with damage equal to 26.2% of ATK + 1 dealing against the target every second (does not work on bosses).

skills.name: Go, Dolly!
skills.description: Throw out Dolly after dodging. Dolly stays for 10 seconds, absorbing nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to 84.6% of ATK + 4 against them, and taunting them for 1.5 seconds (cannot taunt enemies when in a team) to divert their attacks to Dolly.

skills.name: Sparkling Collider
skills.description: Spark fires out Sparks that last for 15-seconds and bounces between the target and the Wanderer. Upon hitting the target, the Sparks slow it down (not strong control) for 4 seconds with a 15-second cooldown. Sparks deal more damage the further it travels. On hit, it deals damage to up to 350% of ATK + 37 and inflicts a 25-second Emblazen mark on the target. At the same time, Spark fires 4 bullets, with each bullet dealing damage equal to 50% of ATK + 3 against its target. Spark's normal attacks deal 110% more damage to Emblazen-marked targets. If the target has a self-inflicted burning effect, when Sparks hit a target, it burns or ignites the target once and deals additional damage equal to 100% of the total remaining damage (multiple burns or ignition effects are counted together). The result calculation cooldown is 6 seconds. Skill cooldown is 30 seconds. Passive: When Sparks is active, each time Spark Attack deals damage, the Wanderer gains 1 point of Heat with a 0.9-second cooldown, up to 8 points of Heat. Upon Heat reaching the upper limit, the Wanderer gains the Ultimate Heat effect, increasing flame ATK by 25% for 25 seconds.

skills.name: Supernova
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon removes all debuffs from the wielder. Spark enters a charged state, continuously blasting searing energy beams at the target location before eventually exploding. Deal damage equal to 750% of ATK + 39. If the target has a self-inflicted burning effect, then burn or ignite it once and deal additional damage equal to 100% of the total remaining damage (multiple burning or ignition effects are counted collectively). The result calculation cooldown is 6 seconds. Damage immunity lasts for 2.6 seconds when the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).

weapon_type.name: Flame
weapon_type.description: Fully charged weapons will set the target on fire for 8 seconds with the next attack, causing ongoing damage of 58% of ATK every second. Ignited targets receive 50% efficacy from healing.

weapon_resonance.name: Flame Resonance
weapon_resonance.description: Increase flame ATK by 20% and flame resistance by 40%. Activate by equipping 2 or more flame weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot.

advancement: Emblazen boosts the damage of Spark's normal attacks to 182%. Skill cooldown drops to 24 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.
Emblazen increases flame boost by 18%, increasing burn multiplier by 150%.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 32%.
Each time Spark Attack hit an enemy, restore an additional 75 points of the weapon charge. Cooldown: 0.9 second. When Ultimate Heat is active, shatter increases by 25%.
Emblazen boosts the damage of Spark's normal attacks to 240%. Heat acquisition efficiency doubles. Skill cooldown drops to 16 seconds.

traits.name: Dreamcatcher
traits.description: Increase the flame damage taken by all enemies within 5 meters of Dolly by 8%. Not stackable.

traits.name: Dolly's Domain
traits.description: Increase the flame damage received by all enemies within 5 meters of Dolly by 8%. Not stackable. After throwing out Dolly, increase flame ATK by 12% for 10 seconds. Not stackable.
